get.description:
**Retrieves the list of vaccine availabilities within the vicinity of a
`postal_code` and after the `min_date`.**

parameters.description:
**Search for vaccine availabilities after a certain date and time (UTC) in the format YYYY-MM-DD**. The default value is the current date (UTC).

Valid example(s): *2021-05-30*

tags.name: Vaccine Locations
tags.description: Operations about vaccine availability grouped by location.

tags.name: Vaccine Availability
tags.description: Operations about vaccine availability. _Vaccine availability should include a certain date and location._

tags.name: Locations
tags.description: Operations about locations. _Each location should correspond to a place where vaccine shots are administered._

tags.name: Addresses
tags.description: Operations about addresses. _A location has a one-to-one relationship with an address._

tags.name: Organizations
tags.description: Operations about organizations. _Each organization is responsible for administering vaccines._

tags.name: Requirements
tags.description: Operations about eligibility requirements. _An eligibility requirement must be met in order for one to receive a vaccine._
